NVMeSMARTMetrics.longDescription: This object shall contain the NVMe SMART metrics as defined by the NVMe SMART/Health Information log page.

StorageControllerMetrics.description: The usage and health statistics for a storage controller.
StorageControllerMetrics.longDescription: The StorageControllerMetrics schema shall contain the usage and health statistics for a storage controller in a Redfish implementation.

title: #StorageControllerMetrics.StorageControllerMetrics
